title: Bug report: trinity:ValueError: max_workers must be greater than 0
body:
* py-evm Version: x.x.x
* OS: Ubuntu 18.04
* Python Version (python --version): 3.6.5
* Environment (output of `pip freeze`): 


### What is wrong?
Got the error: `ValueError: max_workers must be greater than 0`after starting trinity 
 
Please include information like:

* full output of the error you received
```
/_  __/____(_)___  (_) /___  __
  / / / ___/ / __ \/ / __/ / / /
 / / / /  / / / / / / /_/ /_/ / 
/_/ /_/  /_/_/ /_/_/\__/\__, /  
                       /____/   
    INFO  06-02 17:06:09        main  Trinity/0.1.0a11/linux/cpython3.6.5
   DEBUG  06-02 17:06:09  selector_events  Using selector: EpollSelector
   DEBUG  06-02 17:06:09  selector_events  Using selector: EpollSelector
    INFO  06-02 17:06:09         ipc  IPC started at: /home/ankit/.local/share/trinity/mainnet/jsonrpc.ipc
    INFO  06-02 17:06:09      server  Running server...
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14      server  No UPNP-enabled devices found
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14      server  enode://36a8ec49384cbf7ce8dc9f3a6ec13629526dd5e5582fdbe5cf56ef777b9256eb3d591f6a0f981f4b3b7d90d90bc8c2391673405637bf315fbf998a8ab8d5bbe0@0.0.0.0:30303
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14      server  network: 1
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14      server  peers: max_peers=25
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14        peer  Running PeerPool...
   DEBUG  06-02 17:06:14        peer  Connecting to <Node(0x1118@52.74.57.123)>...
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14        peer  Connected peers: 0 inbound, 0 outbound
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14        sync  Starting fast-sync; current head: #0
   ERROR  06-02 17:06:14     service  Unexpected error in <p2p.sync.FullNodeSyncer object at 0x7f8ac09e19b0>, exiting
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ankit/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/p2p/service.py", line 61, in run
    await self._run()
  File "/home/ankit/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/p2p/sync.py", line 44, in _run
    await self._sync()
  File "/home/ankit/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/p2p/sync.py", line 56, in _sync
    chain_syncer = FastChainSyncer(self.chaindb, self.peer_pool, self.cancel_token)
  File "/home/ankit/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/p2p/chain.py", line 84, in __init__
    self._executor = ProcessPoolExecutor(cpu_count)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/concurrent/futures/process.py", line 394, in __init__
    raise ValueError("max_workers must be greater than 0")
ValueError: max_workers must be greater than 0
   DEBUG  06-02 17:06:14     service  <p2p.server.Server object at 0x7f8ac1a54b70> finished cleanly
    INFO  06-02 17:06:14      server  Closing server...
```
* what command you ran
`trinity &`

* the code that caused the failure (see [this link](https://help.github.com/articles/basic-writing-and-formatting-syntax/) for help with formatting code)


### How can it be fixed
?
